list_items: [Setup] - Use of an existing database allowed
[Setup] - Adjusted to the current Peakboard Designer setup
[Lists](/hub/Lists/en-hub_new-list.html) - Fix for a bug where the display unintentionally automatically jumped back to the first page when editing a value
[Lists](/hub/Lists/en-hub_new-list.html) - Fix for a bug where the display unintentionally changed the number of items shown when editing a value
[Lists](/hub/Lists/en-hub_new-list.html) - Adjusted options for the number of elements displayed per page
[Lists](/hub/Lists/en-hub_new-list.html) - Adjusted select statements for all read processes
[Logs] - Fix for a bug where the filters did not work properly
[Logs] - Added display of affected user and user group
[User management](/hub/en-hub_usermanagement.html) - Fix for a bug where it was possible to remove own admin rights as the only administrator
[User management](/hub/en-hub_usermanagement.html) - Fix for a bug where a user role was missing
[User administration](/hub/en-hub_usermanagement.html) - Fix for a bug where it was not possible to add new user groups
[User Management](/hub/en-hub_usermanagement.html) - Users can be manipulated if the Peakboard Box is added with a user with the appropriate role
[Peakboard Boxes](/hub/Peakboard_Hub_on_premise/en-hub_boxmanagement.html) - Fix for a bug where Peakboard Boxes could not be deleted properly
